summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to parking rates; amending Section 11.16.120 of the Seattle Municipal Code and adding a new section to Chapter 11.16 of the Seattle Municipal Code to authorize the Director of Seattle Transportation to establish rates for parking payment devices within limits established by ordinance; setting limits on parking rates at parking payment devices; and rescinding a portion of the parking rate policy adopted by Resolution 28986 and reaffirmed in Resolution 30585.
